name: School Bus Driving Skill
description:
School Bus Driving Skill is realistic 3D bus simulator game for youngster and teens. It’s a roller coaster crazy joyful ride; learn how drive and park bus transport vehicles in empty parking lot. Get real life experience from bus simulator, drive passenger buses and pickup van. Park bus in the empty parking lot before timer goes off.
Features:
• Awesome graphics
• Realistic sound system
• Different buses
• Exciting stages
• Interesting game play
